name: Project: FROSTBITE
description:
You started a new job as a security gaurd at Frostbite's Playground. Once your shift begins, you start to suspect an odd behavior from the mascot, Frostbite teddy. Finish all your tasks to get through the night, goodluck....

controls : provided in the game

(This game was originally for a game jam, but due to file loss i had to recreate the whole game, resulting me not uploading the game in time.)

models by : msimunek

sounds by : msimunek

music by : msimunek
